value.fullName: HD - Emergency Notice Land Entry Notice
value.label: HD - Emergency Notice Land Entry Notice

value.fullName: Further investigation - I need to reattend to continue my investigations
value.label: Further investigation - I need to reattend to continue my investigations

value.fullName: Private leak investigation – Further CI work required
value.label: Private leak investigation – Further CI work required

value.fullName: Private leak investigation – Further R&M work required
value.label: Private leak investigation – Further R&M work required

value.fullName: Private pressure - diagnosed, no further work
value.label: Private pressure - diagnosed, no further work

value.fullName: Private pressure investigation – further R&M work required
value.label: Private pressure investigation – further R&M work required

value.fullName: I have taken samples to test, it will take 10 working days for the results, and we will contact you when we have them
value.label: I have taken samples to test, it will take 10 working days for the results, and we will contact you when we have them

value.fullName: Further investigation – Someone from my team needs to reattend for further investigation
value.label: Further investigation – Someone from my team needs to reattend for further investigation

value.fullName: Further work R&M - I have arranged for a team to reattend and complete more work
value.label: Further work R&M - I have arranged for a team to reattend and complete more work

value.fullName: We have completed and reinstated one excavation, but will need to come back out and dig again to complete our investigations
value.label: We have completed and reinstated one excavation, but will need to come back out and dig again to complete our investigations

value.fullName: Our work is not finished, we have carried out some investigation to find out what we need to do next.
value.label: Our work is not finished, we have carried out some investigation to find out what we need to do next.

value.fullName: We have completed the work – No clean up
value.label: We have completed the work – No clean up

value.fullName: We have completed the work – someone will be back out to do further investigation, Clean Up has been requested
value.label: We have completed the work – someone will be back out to do further investigation, Clean Up has been requested

value.fullName: We have completed the work – someone will be back out to do further investigation
value.label: We have completed the work – someone will be back out to do further investigation

value.fullName: Our work is not finished, another dig team will be along to continue the work
value.label: Our work is not finished, another dig team will be along to continue the work

value.fullName: Private leak – diagnosed, no further work
value.label: Private leak – diagnosed, no further work

value.fullName: We have completed the work – Clean Up has been requested
value.label: We have completed the work – Clean Up has been requested
